message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's worth a lot to me, but I'm willing to start the negotiation at $1,400,000.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay up to $1,300,000. I hope we can reach an agreement.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  While I'm eager to sell to you, I can't go lower than $1,350,000. It's still a great deal for both of us. Let's find a middle ground.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $1,320,000. I believe this is a fair compromise for both of us.
